name: safari-window-manager
title: Safari Window Manager
description: An extention for making safari windows and navigating through existing.
author: michael_pedersen

commands.name: new-safari-window
commands.title: New Safari Window
commands.subtitle: Creates a new Safari window
commands.description: Opens a new clean Safari window

commands.name: switch-safari-window
commands.title: Switch Safari Window
commands.subtitle: Swithces between existing Safari windows
commands.description: Lets you switch between exisitng Safari windows

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
